name: Monarch of Greed - Act 1
description: In Labyrinth Mode, challenge 9 levels, with each one being more challenging than the last! In Story Mode, control various characters and make the right choices to avoid the multiple dead ends and find a way to get out of an abandoned orphanage.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated 512MB Graphic Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated 512MB Graphic Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
